Parameter.name: FORMNAME
Parameter.Description: Form name, not a global key so it can be anything

Parameter.name: OBJPERMISSIONS
Parameter.Description: Default permissions Objects of this form can be Created, Read, Updated and Deleted Redefine this parameter to change permissions for everyone Redefine checkPermission method (see Form.Security) for this class to add custom security based on user/roles/etc.

Parameter.name: DISPLAYPROPERTY
Parameter.Description: Property used for basic information about the object By default getObjectDisplayName method gets its value from it

UDLText.name: T
UDLText.Content: // Form properties below. Mandatory part above.

Property.name: displayName
Property.Description: The main property describing this object, automatically computes on insert or update (for SQL) or on save (for object access)

Method.name: recreate2
Method.Implementation: do ..%DeleteExtent() set obj = ..%New() set obj.Text = 123 write obj.%Save()
